metadata.name: Everything or Nothing
metadata.description:
Everything or Nothing 

Reflection on the topic of human self-identification. 

The path of self-identification is a process of distinguishing oneself from animals, objects, animals, other people. What is human essence, what is "I"? A collective image of everything that exists or a unique form? An entity with a soul or a bunch of matter? Cosmic appointment or mere chance? Everything or nothing?

The work was done as a digital collage of photos of my body.  Used digital drawing, scanning, hand drawing.  Bare feelings and sensations.
———
2 0 2 3
